Dating: NAQADA (not before); NAQADA II ?; NAQADA (not after)
Name: Diorite vase with large crystals
Description: This beautiful diorite vase comes from the excavations of Girza carried out by G. Wainwright. The receptacle presents a narrowing towards the neck from the belly, where there are two "handles", each with two holes used to pass a cord for suspension.
